name: Tony and the Mask
description:
Welcome to Tony and the mask.  

This is my very first game made with the godot game engine. This game was a an entry for the Weekly Game Jam 131. The theme was: Magic Mask

This is about Tony who found himself in weird dungeon. His curiosity led to more problems.

Controls: WAD/Arrow key, Space, ,Mouse

Credits:

Programming: JulyTheMonth

Art: JulyTheMonth

Soundtrack: Ozzed

Soundeffects: Juhani Junkala
